list.title: module:blocklyUnixFilters_lib
list.description: Functions defining the blocks for Unix filters.

list.title: module:blocklyUnixFilters_lib~getContext~COMMANDS
list.description: List of commands with tooltips and format use

list.title: module:blocklyUnixFilters_lib~getContext~SYMBOL_NAMES
list.description: List of symbols used for redirection

list.title: module:blocklyUnixFilters_lib~getContext~NOOP_NAMES
list.description: List of noop (no operation) blocks used for placeholders

list.title: module:blocklyUnixFilters_lib.makeGrepBlock
list.description: Creates a grep block definition.

list.title: module:blocklyUnixFilters_lib~getContext~generateCodeForCommand
list.description: Generates code for a command block using the extracted options

list.title: module:blocklyUnixFilters_lib~getContext~makeOptionBlock
list.description: Creates option blocks based on their type (flag or field index).

list.title: module:blocklyUnixFilters_lib.makeCommandBlock
list.description: Creates command block for each object in Array.

list.title: module:blocklyUnixFilters_lib.makeNoopBlock
list.description: Creates noop blocks with a specified color.

list.title: module:blocklyUnixFilters_lib.makeSymbolBlock
list.description: Creates symbol blocks with a specified color.

list.title: module:jsongenerator
list.description: Contains functions handling the JSON generation.

list.title: module:jsongenerator.jsonGenerator.scrub_
list.description: Cleans up a generated block's code by removing comments.

list.title: module:jsongenerator.jsonGenerator.scrubNakedValue
list.description: Removes inline comments from a string line.

list.title: module:jsongenerator.makeCommandGenerator
list.description: Creates a generator function for a shell command.

list.title: module:jsongenerator.jsonGenerator.grep
list.description: Generates grep command with options and pattern.

list.title: module:jsongenerator.jsonGenerator.text_input
list.description: Returns the text value from a text input block.

list.title: module:jsongenerator~removeEventualQuotes
list.description: Removes quotes from a string if they are valid

list.title: module:jsongenerator.getFieldValue
list.description: Gets the value from a block's field, optionally cleaning quotes for library export.

list.title: module:jsongenerator~extractChainedBlocksForCode
list.description: Extracts command-line arguments from a chain of connected blocks.

list.title: module:jsongenerator.jsonGenerator.robot_start
list.description: Generates code by traversing blocks connected to robor_start block

list.title: module:unixfilters
list.description: Functions related to Blockly blocks for Unix filters.

list.title: module:unixfilters.reset
list.description: Resets the internal output state of UnixFilters.

list.title: module:unixfilters.resetDisplay
list.description: Defines the display by creating the buttons and display areas for: Executing commands, navigating through steps and displaying generated code, the current step, and output.

list.title: module:unixfilters.fillEmptyOptionInputs
list.description: Fills empty input fields (PARAM_0) with no-op blocks if they are not connected.

list.title: module:unixfilters.removeNoops
list.description: Removes all no-op blocks from the workspace.

list.title: module:unixfilters.sendCommandToServer
list.description: Sends generated Python code to the backend server for execution.

list.title: module:unixfilters.parseJson
list.description: Parses JSON data from the server into internal step functions.

list.title: module:unixfilters.nextStep
list.description: Moves to the next step in the parsed JSON steps.

list.title: module:unixfilters.end
list.description: Skips to the final step in the parsed JSON steps.

list.title: module:unixfilters.backToBeginning
list.description: Resets to the beginning of the parsed JSON steps.

list.title: module:unixfilters.showStep
list.description: Displays a specific step in the parsed command steps.
